snippet: Despite no reports of patients being hurt, a second case of problems involving wires for cardiac devices from St. Jude Medical caused the company to stop those sales.
abstract: St Jude Medical will stop selling two types of wires used in devices that treat heart failure because conductive wires in some cases were sticking out of their insulation; wires are QuckSite and QuickFlex; there are no reports of patients being hurt or devices malfunctioning.
lead_paragraph: Despite no reports of patients being hurt, a second case of problems involving wires for cardiac devices from St. Jude Medical caused the company to stop those sales.

headline.seo: St. Jude to Stop Selling Certain Device Wires
headline.main: St. Jude to Stop Selling Certain Device Wires
headline.print_headline: St. Jude to Stop Selling Certain Device Wires
